main.name: Evan Hassan
main.description: A dedicated college graduate with a BS in information technology, seeking entry level employment.  Aiming to use enthusiasm, diligence and technical coursework to secure a relevant IT position
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers.
resume.learnmessage: Here is a list of technologies where I'm currently obtaining more knowledge.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Completed a redesign of the website to provide an engaging visual layout and improved usability. Continue to maintain site and provide necessary enhancements.

work.title: IT Specialist
work.description: Created a website for green infrastructure technologies. Developed a task scheduling web application.

work.title: Waiter / Server
work.description: Delivered attentive, quality service to senior residents as member of wait staff team.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
